com.iLabs.spice.common.config
Class ConfigurationHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.iLabs.spice.common.config.ConfigurationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface
public class ConfigurationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationInterface

This class is a configuration handler for the entire application. It makes use of the apache commons configuration internally. The objective of this class is to manage all types of properties (.properties/.xml and system) by the use of a common interface (ConfigInterface).

Method Detail

getApplicationConfiguration

public static ConfigurationInterface getApplicationConfiguration()
This method returns the application configuration to the requesting code.If the configuration is not loaded, it is loaded by this method. In case the configuration is already loaded, it is simple returned to the caller.

Returns:
ConfigurtaionInerface This application configuration is exposed via this interface.
